subject: Send sales memo
content:
Remind sales team about company-wide training meeting Tuesday October 25, 2016. The following common pitfalls will be discussed:

  • Assuming the problem that the prospect communicates is the real problem.
  • Thinking that your sales “presentation” will seal the deal.
  • Talking too much
  • Believing that you can sell anybody anything.
  • Over-educating the prospect when you should be selling.
  • Failing to remember that salespeople are decision makers, too.
  • Reading minds
